desc: Inspired by the vintage fashion of the 1940’s and 50’s, Retrospec'd design retro dresses and clothing that capture the magic of that halcyon era. If you like the look of vintage dresses, your Retrospec’d dresses will be your new favourite outfits. Made in Australia.

layout.text:
Until Monday 20th June midnight
Vintage Inspired Fashion
For Everyday Sophisticated
Feminine Flair
